website_summaries.verdict: An effective set of four different massage balls that provide versatility and convenience for at-home massages.
pros: Includes a large high-density ball, classic lacrosse ball, medium-size firm ball, and medium spiky ball
Penetrates more deeply into muscles than foam rollers do
Includes ebook with exercises and carrying case for travel and storage
cons: Some buyers had trouble accessing the free ebook
Balls may be too hard depending on use

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Come w/ Book as Pictured
customer_reviews.text: The balls are awesome for relieving pain and tight muscles but I was expecting a massage guide book or pamphlet with it because it was pictured but they do not come with the book.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yes! These work wonders!
customer_reviews.text: These fitness balls are awesome! They work just like they show you. Different sizes, density, and surfaces make these great for working out any myscle. I use the large ball to stretch my neck. I use the small blue ball to really work out knots in my back, and I use the red ball and yellow spikey ball on the bottom of my feet. I highly recommend these! I used to use a regular tennis ball, but these definitely make a difference and now these are all I use. Great value too!
customer_reviews.author: SavvyShopper

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: These can be used on the floor or against a wall to work out tight muscles, release fascia and trigger points. This set helps make self care easier for hard to reach areas, which may increase range of motion. There is no strong odor and it seems helpful for back and hip soreness.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I call them my "Magic Balls".
customer_reviews.text: After embarking on a walking regime of several miles a day, I began to develop painful feet, ankles, calves, and thighs. Aside from getting different shoes with more stability for my ankles, I needed something to help massage those overworked muscles. I really like that this set has a variety of sizes and hardness so that I can vary the pressure and coverage to suit the area I want to work on. I regularly go to a massage therapist who works on myofascial release and trigger point massage, but this gives me the ability to self-massage between appointments at my convenience. Try rolling the softer red spiky ball on the TOPS of your feet. Those muscles need attention too.
customer_reviews.author: JayDee

customer_reviews.title: Sighs of relief!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this specifically for the large spiky balls, and have been loving them! The other two are pleasant surprises- the large foam ball has been incredible and replaced an inflatable ball of the same size, and the lacrosse ball is so much better for travel than a raquetball- Ahhh!
customer_reviews.author: Sight By Touch

customer_reviews.title: Way too hard
customer_reviews.text: All of them felt hard as rocks. I tried to use them and it was literally like rolling a rock into my back, some give would have helped soften the massage a little. I sent them back. If you want a really hard, deep, sports massage, then this is for you. If you're looking for a little more subtlety, then maybe keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: Kriss Kathy Hinders

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be a quality product!
customer_reviews.text: I could not access the free ebook and the website email did not work. I am kinda stuck trying to figure out how to use the different sizes. Until I receive what should have been included one star from me. Note: Seller promptly followed up and emailed me a copy of the guide. I am looking forward to seeing if they help!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delivers real results
customer_reviews.text: I have sciatica issues and bought a set of these for myself, I had such great results that when my dad began to suffer from the same issues I bought them for him for Christmas. The set comes with different types and sizes of balls so it’s great for any size person or any type of muscle. Would definitely recommend especially for someone struggling with chronic muscle pain.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Buttler

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: This did not work that great for me. I’m used to using a lacrosse ball and get a much better range of motion with it. I was happy that when I opened it there was no toxic smell.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied with this product
customer_reviews.text: The large ball is too hard for Myofascial Release therapy. In my recent visit to the inventor of this therapy technique office John Barnes, I was provided with the ball, which is softer and can be inflated. Unfortunately you should do quite often when ball losing some air after the treatment. The smallest ball(blue) is too small to apply it on the floor or wall (for my applications). Read and yellow balls are represent some value but for my treatment and need a smooth surface balls. This review solely reflect my experience with the product and therefore is subjective.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: The massage balls are good quality
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know what to expect when I ordered these. I love the the hard racquetball. It feels wonderful on my back. The spiky balls are great too, one is harder than the other. The hard foam ball is way bigger than I expected but is really great. This set is a nice mix for just about any muscle that is ailing you.
customer_reviews.author: KindleAddictDenver

customer_reviews.title: While I have not had occasion to use the full ...
customer_reviews.text: While I have not had occasion to use the full set of balls yet, I have found immediate relief from my plantar fasciitis by using the green spiky ball. The package came on time and that is always appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Hynson

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: We obtained these devices at the recommendation of a friend. She described her experience with them. They are as described by her. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: David Loughmiller

customer_reviews.title: Pain be gone
customer_reviews.text: Worked wonders on my sciatic nerves, I’m almost healed. Although nerve pain stayed constant, pain from lower back kept moving and the different balls helped to dig into those areas where I had knots and pain. The cost wasn’t bad and the extra ball was my deal sealer.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have
customer_reviews.text: I have to use these to massage my back and shoulder. I prefer to use the largest black one the most, followed by the red one. The others I use occasionally. They also give you an extra flag colored rubber ball too that's not included in the description or photo, which is kinda neat. All in all, they're quite an asset.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Brentano

customer_reviews.title: Shoulder Impigiment
customer_reviews.text: ordered these for some shoulder pain I've been dealing with. and WOW. I was skeptical at first, but after using the small blue ball on my shoulder/back area against a wall, I felt so much better. Really gets all the knots out depending which ball and area you use it on. I also lay on it on the floor with my chest weight on it. It's like getting a massage. The big ball is great for your legs and calves. Gets in deep. Will continue to use these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The book online is deceiving its not was it is
customer_reviews.text: Their was no big fat book like the picture shows. It was just a one pages paper that's all no book😕
customer_reviews.author: Richard Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I have fibromyalgia and suffer alot of spasms in my feet, calves, hips, shoulders, neck, and lots of random places. With the use of the different sizes I can self sooth and release the worst of the knots, trigger points and spasms without hand cramps. Well worth the price! I have used a $40 ball and the large black one in this set was just as effective!
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine in helping recover from knee replacement surgery. I used them to roll the upper leg and hip.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: One purchase fits all!
customer_reviews.text: Great set of various size, texture and firmness therapy balls. Pick this set for when spots are very tender to push on and as time goes on, the tender spots lessen and you can graduate to a more firm ball. These are catered for various locations on the body.
customer_reviews.author: JustWindowShopping :)

customer_reviews.title: perfect sizes
customer_reviews.text: This was a good combinattion of balls I was looking for. I wanted a bigger ball to use under my head and the smaller ball my husband can use for his planter... for his foot. This set was exactly what I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: MommyofQ

customer_reviews.title: Great for treating pressure points
customer_reviews.text: I am using these to deal with those areas of tightness we all have. I love they were so reasonably priced and the variety of sizes allows me to use an appropriate ball for different body parts. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: ddbfamily

customer_reviews.title: Okay, but....
customer_reviews.text: These are great quality, but hard for my husband to use on his neck and back. Our son plays with them now so I guess all is not lost 😁
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Relief without a masseuse!
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of tension in my neck, back and shoulder areas and this product helps me loosen up in between deep tissue massages. Easy enough to use on your own but even better with a willing friend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Great product, very well done , great materials....no more to say the best
customer_reviews.author: psycho

customer_reviews.title: Great variety
customer_reviews.text: These massage balls are perfect to help release tensed muscles and target specific areas of the body. It hurts so good!! It's a love/hate relationship with these balls though, but they work!
customer_reviews.author: Sahar Abu-khalaf

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: He’s ate amazing. After one use, the pain in my traps that I had for years subsided for several weeks!
customer_reviews.author: JBull

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Good quality balls. Couldn't find a use for the spiked ones. The lacrosse ball is great for many body parts. My unexpected favorite is the 5" foam ball, really digs into the hips.
customer_reviews.author: A Reader

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Not for me to hard and not what I need to get things loose in as well not a free book and think it came used
customer_reviews.author: KAY

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: I got this set to help me recover from some muscle tightness that's been causing a lot of trouble for me lately. So far so good, the set has been really helpful and handy! The quality of the products is excellent, I couldn't be more happy!
customer_reviews.author: Dzenana Basic

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This set was a good variety... And the cost was right... I have been working out daily and have got lots and lots of sore muscles and these are ways of helping work the muscles through that...
customer_reviews.author: Lynda Arocha

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a friend and she loves it for her back
customer_reviews.author: shannon

customer_reviews.title: Cheap crap from china
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality but work alright. I love when these crap products state the thing they're not in their name. Far from invincible. I'm sure these balls couldn't be manufactured any cheaper. The lacrosse ball was dirty and scuffed.
customer_reviews.author: Devon Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great service ensuring it arrived
customer_reviews.text: Very good products, both of them. Seller was highly proactive in ensuring it was properly received as well, especially under the shipping constraints due to Covid. I would def buy again from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Jedidiah Dairy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gift for Athletes!
customer_reviews.text: These deep tissue massage balls are just great, I use them before I start training and you can just feel how it helps and upgrade the muscles capacity. I also use them after my soccer games and it’s so relaxing. The variety of balls is good too. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: OdedG

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for a personal trainer!
customer_reviews.text: Im currently a personal trainer and i use these for my cilents and myself. Good quality and get the job done. Like the instructions said dont roll on bone or the spine. If your unsure if its a safe spot to roll, ask a trainer and most will be able to show you.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Sharpe

customer_reviews.title: balls
customer_reviews.text: this set is awesome , & at an great price !
customer_reviews.author: Bart

customer_reviews.title: Best Fitness Massage Balls!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great service!!! Items arrived on time and in a nice mesh bag for safe storage. My wife loves the massage balls for her back pain. These items were highly recommended by her PT and in just two days she was able to lower her back pain to null. Thank you for an amazing product.
customer_reviews.author: Perez

customer_reviews.title: Best sack of balls
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these balls so much I haven't needed to go to the chiropractor. I've found ways to use each one. The are great.
customer_reviews.author: R. Trevor Rees

customer_reviews.title: Great and fast customer service
customer_reviews.text: Product is exactly as described and pictured! Good product for the price! Customer service/support is excellent!! I will buy from Invincible again!!
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My PT recommended this for my tendonosis of my hip and he was correct. This saved me while I traveled to London on a long flight. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: karen novakoski

customer_reviews.title: I use these daily for all those sore muscles after a hard workout.
customer_reviews.text: I've used these at the gym, and decided to buy my own set; they are wonderful! They hit all those tired, aching muscles and sore spots! I would recommend them for anyone who wants relief from sore, hard to reach muscles!

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: These seem to be good quality. I have used them twice with great effect.

customer_reviews.title: An awesome product for an amazing price !
customer_reviews.text: Provides a great relief before and after every workout and works on every part of your lower back and torso. Thank you!!

customer_reviews.title: Quality of all the balls was very good. There was also an additional ball included
customer_reviews.text: Quality of all the balls was very good. There was also an additional ball included.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome set. Would absolutely recommend for pain relief
customer_reviews.text: I have used many different types of these balls and rollers in order to relieve pain and hit pressure pouts. These balls are great I would totally recommend this set.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne S.

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best money I’ve ever spent!! Wow!! I just used the peanut and single lacrosse balls and I feel AMAZING!!!! My body got an instant dose of energy with just 5 minutes of use! I get a lot of physical therapy and deep tissue massages due to chronic back pain... these are by far the best therapy I’ve received in a long time! Highly recommended!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quick, easy, convenient- less pain
customer_reviews.text: Have a bad back, constant pain! Easier now that I have ur balls!!

customer_reviews.title: Amazing relief for muscle pain
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I have very tense back muscles but when I roll around on these and use them on my trigger points it gives relief like nothing else. I use mainly the little blue ball for feet, calves and back, but the big black ball is a must for glutes and thighs. Spikey balls add a different texture.

customer_reviews.title: Great balls of fire
customer_reviews.text: Used mine today and I loved every body part it hit
customer_reviews.author: S Wade

customer_reviews.title: Best Purchase for Getting Rid of Knots
customer_reviews.text: This little guy and I are now best friends. I've had a ton of different back pain relief and this peanut gets deep into the knots like nothing else can.
customer_reviews.author: SKT

customer_reviews.title: These are great quality products and I am extremely happy with them
customer_reviews.text: This set is just GLORIOUS. Thank you invisible Fitness, this is exactly what I have been looking forever since I saw one of these deep tissue massage balls used by my trainer at the gym. These are great quality products and I am extremely happy with them. I have recently read a book that shows how useful each item is in a daily routine for joint and posture maintenance after working at a desk for over 35 years.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Love them well made, cake with a great book on how to use them. Would definitely buy from them again.

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Feels great to work out the knots in your back!

customer_reviews.title: Love this!

customer_reviews.title: Really great bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: I had my doubts due to the fact that it was priced for so cheap considering what other companies usually charge for similar products but I’m happy to say they have far exceeded my expectations in terms of the quality of the massage balls.

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift

customer_reviews.title: Saved my butt!
customer_reviews.text: Love the variety of items included! I've had tight glutes, hamstrings, and back for a couple of weeks now. These have been great in loosening up the muscles and providing relief.

customer_reviews.title: deep tissue massage balls These massage balls are great, they really penetrate deep into the muscle
customer_reviews.text: deep tissue massage balls These massage balls are great, they really penetrate deep into the muscle. great for trigger point treatment and for deep tissue massage. Those spiky balls are a great bonus.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of knots in my shoulders and these massage balls are perfect for releasing the tension, they are always in my gym bag and I keep a second set at home.

customer_reviews.title: Great product for anyone looking for pain relief!

customer_reviews.title: Very useful

product_meta.title: Deep Tissue Massage Ball Set - Includes 5" Foam Roller Mobility Ball, Double Peanut Lacrosse Ball, Spiky Ball for Trigger Point Therapy, Myofascial Release, Foot Reflexology, Plantar Fasciitis
feature_bullets: PERFECT SIZE - The unique 5 inch diameter is the perfect size to perform a concentrated massage to any specific areas of the body. It's much more effective than smaller massage balls and foam rollers because of its multi-dimensional roll capabilities

IMMEDIATE BENEFITS - Releases sore and tight muscle knots, trigger point therapy and deep tissue massage to rejuvenate and revitalize all areas of the body, myofascial release, plantar fasciitis, a brilliant solution for chronic back & shoulder pains

SELF MASSAGE TOOL – Easy to use, simply lean on the massage ball and use your own body weight and gravity. Boost your blood stream, increases joint mobility, enhances muscle performance, 5’’ high density ball, 2.5’’ lacrosse ball, 5.3'' foam peanut massage ball.
PREVENTS INJURIES & SPEEDS UP RECOVERY - Roll 10-15 min before & after training, one of the most recommended therapy tools for athletes: football, CrossFit, yoga, gym workout
GET YOURS NOW – Customer service available 24 hours a day, LIFETIME WARRANTY, if you're not 100% satisfied, simply return it for a full refund, no questions asked – buy it without hesitation
